body_html:
Why not calculate vocab_size automatically? Are there any reasons?

vocab_size is actually calculated in https://github.com/tensorflow/models/blob/master/tutorials/rnn/ptb/ptb_word_lm.py#L457

train_data, valid_data, test_data, _ = raw_data

but it was ignored.
body_text:
Why not calculate vocab_size automatically? Are there any reasons?
vocab_size is actually calculated in https://github.com/tensorflow/models/blob/master/tutorials/rnn/ptb/ptb_word_lm.py#L457
train_data, valid_data, test_data, _ = raw_data
but it was ignored.
body:
Why not calculate `vocab_size` automatically? Are there any reasons? 

`vocab_size` is actually calculated in https://github.com/tensorflow/models/blob/master/tutorials/rnn/ptb/ptb_word_lm.py#L457
```python3
train_data, valid_data, test_data, _ = raw_data
```
but it was ignored.
